New Records: Kutter Crawford became the first Red Sox starter since 2022 to make 30 starts
Key Match Events: Crawford allowed three runs over 6 1/3 innings
Cedric Mullins hit two home runs off Crawford
Red Sox offense struggled to score runs despite opportunities
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Alex Cora emphasized the importance of the game for the team's playoff hopes
Red Sox were falling in the wild-card standings
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Cora expressed frustration with the offense
Crawford praised the team's pitching staff but criticized the offense's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Red Sox had 13 strikeouts, a problem for the team
Orioles' Cedric Mullins was a key performer
